text: Need Zoe Wright for Boost Juice campaign. Budget around $4,869, looking for 3 x Lifestyle photography, 3 x 30-second Instagram reel, 3 x Instagram post, 1 x 15-second TikTok, 3 x Twitter post. 6 week exclusivity from other similar brands. Campaign runs January 2026. Usage rights for 11 months. Engagement period: 4 months.
